submission_gap.name: submission_gap
submission_gap.subject: Submission Gap
submission_gap.template: You have not made any submissions in the past 4 days. Are you dong ok? In order to do well in the course, you have to submit code every week.

exercise_count.name: exercise_count
exercise_count.subject: Exercise Count
exercise_count.template: You did not complete three exercises this week.

ai_problems.name: ai_problems
ai_problems.subject: AI Problems
ai_problems.template: You should work on more AI exercises.

challenge_problems.name: challenge_problems
challenge_problems.subject: Challenge Problems
challenge_problems.template: You should work on harder exercises.

consider_dropping.name: consider_dropping
consider_dropping.subject: Consider Dropping
consider_dropping.template: You should consider dropping the course.

doing_fine.name: doing_fine
doing_fine.subject: Doing fine.
doing_fine.template: You're doing fine. Keep working at your current pace. Since you're doing OK, try focusing on AI and challenge problems.

can_relax.name: can_relax
can_relax.subject: You can relax.
can_relax.template: You're doing fine. You've done enough work this quarter and can relax.

exercise_velocity.name: exercise_velocity
exercise_velocity.subject: Exercise Velocity
exercise_velocity.template: On average, you do not submit even one exercise per week. You should try to submit more exercises to bring up this average.
